skills.name: Chaosrazor
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 35% chance to extend duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target by 1 turn. (Books: +20% damage, +10% chance)

skills.name: Dogs of War
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Before attacking, instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. 75% chance of placing 50% [Decrease ATK] on all enemies for 2 turns. (Books: +10% damage, +25% chance, -1 CD)

skills.name: Purifyre
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. First hit: 75% chance to place [HP Burn] on all enemies for 2 turns. Restores this Champion’s destroyed MAX HP by 10% for each [HP Burn] placed. Heals by 5% MAX HP for each [HP Burn] attempt blocked or resisted. (Books: +10% damage, +25% chance, -1 CD)

skills.name: Burning Blood
skills.description: Whenever a [HP Burn] is activated, destroys this Champion’s MAX HP by 5% (up to 50%). Increases this Champion’s DMG, C.DMG, and DEF by 1% for each 1% destroyed MAX HP. Also increases SPD and RES by 2 for each 1% destroyed MAX HP.

ai_quirks_auto_warnings.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. For solo dungeon runs, ensure A3 is prioritized to apply HP Burn.

mechanics_advisory: Synergizes with HP Burn teams, especially for Spider and Hydra. Stat scaling with destroyed MAX HP is unique; manage healing to avoid excessive HP loss. All skills benefit from books.

update_review_notes.author: GitHub Copilot
update_review_notes.summary_of_changes: Initial validated entry from Ayumilove, HellHades, and user screenshot.

notes_comments: Top-tier for Spider, Hydra, Ice Golem, Doom Tower, Faction Wars, and solo dungeon farming. No cheese strategies.
